desc.desc: The Audi A4 has 1 Petrol Engine on offer. The Petrol engine is 1998 cc . It is available with Automatic transmission.Depending upon the variant and fuel typethe A4 has a mileage of 9.4 kmpl. The A4 is a 5 seater 4 cylinder car and has length of 4762mm, width of 1847mm and a wheelbase of 2819mm
